title: Tournament Endpoints Response Models
description: Comprehensive JSON schema documentation for all Tournament API endpoints

NetworkResponse.description: Base response class for network layer

/api/handball/unique-tournament/{tournam.description: Get all events in a round
Get all events in a round

/api/tennis/tournament/{tournamentId}/se.description: Get all events in a round

/api/tournament/{tournamentId}/season/{s.description: Get all events in a round

/api/volleyball/unique-tournament/{tourn.description: Get all events in a round

/api/tournament/{tournamentId}/season/{s.description: Get all events in a round by slug
Get team of the week rounds

notes.inheritance: All response classes extend NetworkResponse base class
notes.nullability: Fields marked as nullable may be absent in the response
notes.pagination: List endpoints typically support span (last/next/all) and page parameters
notes.types: Type parameters in URLs often accept: total, home, away, overall
notes.authentication: Some endpoints may require authentication tokens
